name: test_minting_burning_diff_tokens_single_tx
description:
Test minting one token and burning other token in single transaction.

        Sign transactions using skeys.

        * create a script
        * 1st TX - mint first token
        * 2nd TX - mint second token, burn first token
        * 3rd TX - burn second token
        * check fees in Lovelace
descriptionHtml:
Test minting one token and burning other token in single transaction.

    Sign transactions using skeys.

    * create a script
    * 1st TX - mint first token
    * 2nd TX - mint second token, burn first token
    * 3rd TX - burn second token
    * check fees in Lovelace

    def _cleanup_dead_clusters(self, cget_status: ClusterGetStatus) -> None:
        """Cleanup if the selected cluster instance failed to start."""
        # move on to other cluster instance
        cget_status.selected_instance = -1
        cget_status.restart_here = False
        cget_status.restart_ready = False
    
        # remove status files that are checked by other workers
